original_text:
It is like the dew of Hermon,
    which falls on the mountains of Zion!
For there the Lord has commanded the blessing,
    life forevermore.
korean_text: 헐몬의 이슬이 시온의 산들에 내림 같도다 거기서 여호와께서 복을 명령하셨나니 곧 영생이로다

sentences.original_text: It is like the dew of Hermon,
which falls on the mountains of Zion!
For there the Lord has commanded the blessing,
